comments.author: Smack That Ace
comments.body: My opinion, NFT or meme, altcoins, it's all the same, the purpose that I think people still invest in these days is profit and that's also our purpose in this market. People invest in bitcoin because they like safety, they want long term investment and they don't like short term and risky investments like altcoin or NFT. I am a person who holds most of my assets in bitcoin but I have never missed any trend in the market, as long as it can generate profits then I would consider investing.

comments.body: I tried going into it when it popped off, never really made me interested in the long term. It's just full of hyped a f stuff, which is yes, in some form can be an investment if done properly but the most that you could probably rely on would be luck and not anything good about the NFT itself imo. NFT's are a big thing though, even some big wig companies are doing it though I don't think there's a proper idea as to how you'd actually invite non-NFT enthusiasts into buying them. The hype around it really is about the money being made, and not about the NFT itself from what I've seen.
